html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-04502023-05-18TC
ActAeronautics Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian Aviation Regulations (Part I – 104, Aeronautical Product Approvals)
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (PART I - 104, AERONAUTICAL PRODUCT APPROVALS) in order to (1) update and modernize the charge structure in respect of the issuance, renewal, amendment, or endorsement of aeronautical products; and (2) adjust charge levels annually based on the Consumer Price Index.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0099 Publication Date: 2023-06-07
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Canadian Aviation Regulations (Part I – 104, Aeronautical Product Approvals)
precis: Regulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (PART I - 104, AERONAUTICAL PRODUCT APPROVALS) in order to (1) update and modernize the charge structure in respect of the issuance, renewal, amendment, or endorsement of aeronautical products; and (2) adjust charge levels annually based on the Consumer Price Index.
